suggestions.change: Improve formatting for bullet points in the Experience section.
suggestions.before: • Managed IT and network operations at the Department of Treasuries, Government of Kerala.
suggestions.after: • • Managed IT and network operations at the Department of Treasuries, Government of Kerala.
suggestions.section_advice: Use bullet points to make your achievements stand out.

suggestions.change: Enhance keywords in the Summary section.
suggestions.before: Computer Science and Engineering undergraduate with hands-on experience inbackend development, systems programming, IoT, and government IT operations.
suggestions.after: Highly motivated computer science graduate with expertise in backend development, IoT, and government IT operations, seeking a virtual internship opportunity.
suggestions.section_advice: Tailor your summary to highlight relevant keywords for your target industry.

suggestions.change: Use a consistent formatting style for the Technical Skills section.
suggestions.before: - Backend & Systems: Node.js, TypeScript, Express.js, Spring Boot, REST APIs
suggestions.after: - Backend & Systems: Node.js, TypeScript, Express.js, Spring Boot, REST APIs (All in Modern JavaScript)
suggestions.section_advice: Group similar skills together and use parentheses to clarify the technology stack.

suggestions.change: Quantify achievements in the Experience section.
suggestions.before: • Managed IT and network operations at the Department of Treasuries, Government of Kerala.
suggestions.after: • • Increased network uptime by 30% through proactive maintenance and troubleshooting.
suggestions.section_advice: Use specific numbers to demonstrate the impact of your work.

suggestions.change: Remove unnecessary words and phrases from the Summary section.
suggestions.before: Professional Summary Computer Science and Engineering undergraduate with hands-on experience inbackend development, systems programming, IoT, and government IT operations.
suggestions.after: Computer Science and Engineering undergraduate with hands-on experience in backend development and IoT.
suggestions.section_advice: Keep your summary concise and focused on the most relevant skills.

suggestions.change: Use action verbs consistently in the Experience section.
suggestions.before: • Worked on wire harness assembly and inspection for electronic systems.
suggestions.after: • • Assembled and inspected wire harnesses for electronic systems.
suggestions.section_advice: Use action verbs to describe your work experience.

suggestions.change: Use bullet points to group similar projects together in the Projects section.
suggestions.before: Projects •Smart Home Automation – Habitat (ESP32, Tasmota, Flutter) Built an IoT-based home automation system using ESP32 and Tasmota. Developed a Flutter app (Habitat) for local IP-based device control with remote access via Alexa and Google Assistant.
suggestions.after:
Projects
- Smart Home Automation – Habitat:
• Built an IoT-based home automation system using ESP32 and Tasmota.
• Developed a Flutter app (Habitat) for local IP-based device control with remote access via Alexa and Google Assistant.
suggestions.section_advice: Use bullet points to group related projects together.
